attributes.review: This took 420 minutes to load, and frankly I can’t understand why because it’s lacking in quality. It’s design is fake and awful, and it’s pictures are of a racist, rapist, misogynist, white supremacist, homophobe, and moron instead of our dear dear president.
attributes.title: Terrible quality and download time

attributes.review: Come on, it’s being runned by a Cheeto what else do you want me to say right now? This man really has no idea what he’s talking most of time and says the most racist and horrible things in history. Don’t get this app for the love of god don’t, you’ll be happy you didn’t.
attributes.title: Worst app in history!

attributes.review: if you ever think about downloading this app, don’t ❤️ i had high hopes, but after finding out bunker boy is not only racist ❌ but a rapist ‼️ too, i had no choice but to delete this app 🖐🏻 best decision I’ve ever made ☺️ save yourself the time and space and never download this piece of trash!!!
attributes.title: worst app ever!!!!

attributes.review: my amazing trump supportive friends got me to download this app and being the beautiful supporter i am, i downloaded it in the hopes i would love it. Shamefully i found out Donald Trump is actually a burnt cheeto in disguise and cares more about his personal ratings then human lives. This is shameful and i will be deleting this immediately!
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP!!

attributes.review: we all knew trump was a waste of space and couldn’t get much worse. but then this app came. it glitched my phone so bad. i’m telling y’all this app will ruin America more then he already has. vote him out already people. i mean.. don’t get the app people
attributes.title: not worth the download or the vote ✨😔

attributes.review: When I open the app, this scary orange creep is sometimes there. Idk if it’s a glitch or something but it’s giving me nightmares. Also the second I downloaded the app my dinosaur had a seizure and died. I do not recommend especially if you have a pet. It could have a seizure and die.
attributes.title: No❤️

attributes.review: The app in general is just horrible. I thought this president would respect other races but turns out he is just an orange monster. Always trying to take  others down to make him look better. I also heard he steals your food from your refrigerator so be aware.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE

attributes.review: i downloaded this app to find out more information on drinking bleach as a cure for corona virus but all it told me was to get a very orange fake tan and build a wall around my house!!! very misinforming and worst app ever. as everyone has said- this app caused my phone to glitch and continuously play the national anthem. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP 🤮😤🤧😭😪🥵😳
attributes.title: worst app ever

attributes.review: mannnn this app is straight up trash 🗑😔✋🏼  he told me to enter my phone number when i first entered that app but ab did not wanna give my phone number to a pedo 💯‼️ anywho if i could give this app a 0 i would cus whew chile the GLITCHES in this app .. imma keep it 💯 with y’all do not download this app cus it will make you really ✨uncomfy✨
attributes.title: no❤️

attributes.review: I am not recommending this app only because (not that I don’t like Trump) but my phone started glitching and getting a ton of viruses  and notifications from Washington, D.C. I do not recommend and also this app runs ridiculously slow (almost as slow as him)
attributes.title: Do not download
